StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateCandidateCriteriaCon.rma.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int, @ProgramAvailabilityID int = NULL, @QSN char(9) = NULL, @Quali.ed char(1), @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF @ProgramAvailabilityID IS NOT NULL AND @QSN IS NULL BEGIN UPDATE CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION SET QUALIFIED = @Quali.ed, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE PERSON_ID = @PersonID AND PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID = @ProgramAvailabilityID END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION SET QUALIFIED = @Quali.ed, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE PERSON_ID = @PersonID AND QSN = @QSN END
